author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Thou mayest have heard of such strife, 
When widows and babes beg for life.
In cruel Octember’s cloak, snatched by Hamas abhor,
Then freed 'mongst gold disputes to home thy did restore.

In meadows fair, where beasts of yore do roam,
Heat's wrath and thirst rob grass of its home.
In nature's crucible, the wise in white, do glean,
Seek her secrets to forge a crop ever green.

The frail deal struck 'pon Wall Street, just for jest,
ICBC, the Eastern dragon, its new nest.
From bargain of a coin, woes did runneth o'er,
A prize more beastly than e'en dragon did explore.

feedItems.title: Hamas Releases Hostages After Delay Over Aid Dispute
feedItems.description: The Israeli hostages released were all women and children taken during the attack by Hamas militants on Oct. 7.

feedItems.title: Scientists Are Racing to Protect Grass From Climate Change
feedItems.description: Heat waves and drought are threatening pasture on farms worldwide, prompting experiments to develop hardier crops.

feedItems.title: The Hacked Bank ICBC Paid Just $1 for Its Place on Wall Street
feedItems.description: The China megabank bought its U.S. broker-dealer 13 years ago for practically nothing. It got more than it bargained for.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Hark! Now emerges a new device of trade,
For spoken tales hath Spotify made.
In Premium's realm, 'tis offered near free,
Join and thy purse keep heavy with glee.

Next speaks of gold and fiery strife,
Those who in conflict wage their life.
Seeks research the root of this plight,
In hopes to set our affections right.

For those who've lived three scores of year,
Fret not of boredom, lend me your ear.
For 'tis not age that dulls thy glee,
But silence of mind and heart's apathy.

feedItems.title: The New Economics of Buying or Renting Audiobooks
feedItems.description: Listenable reads just got cheaper with Spotify’s new offering for eligible Premium users.

feedItems.title: What We Fight About When We Fight About Money
feedItems.description: New research tackles the source of financial conflict and what we can do about it.

feedItems.title: More »
feedItems.description: How to avoid being boring at 60

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In vineyard's bosom, white nectar doth flow,
Lively, versatile, value in a bow.
Gradeau la vie, such is the wine's glow,
The draught at hand, ye ought to know.

A game of strength, fierce rivalry set,
Wolverines triumphant, victory met.
Harbaugh absent, yet no regret,
In the heart of battle, their fate was met.

Meta's machinations in the open air,
Quill pens scribe of teen's despair.
In beastly web, caution, beware,
Innocence ensnared in guileful snare.

feedItems.title: More »
feedItems.description: It's lively, versatile and offers outstanding value. The white wine you should be drinking right now.

feedItems.title: Michigan Holds Off Ohio State to Win Again Without Jim Harbaugh
feedItems.description: As the Wolverines coach missed his sixth game of the season because of suspensions, his No. 3 team powered past the No. 2 Buckeyes in their heated rivalry.

feedItems.title: Meta Designed Products to Capitalize on Teen Vulnerabilities, States Say
feedItems.description: Documents that have been unredacted in a complaint filed earlier by states show Meta conversations about age, product design and potential harms.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Of Chauvin, loathed for Floyd's demise,
Attacked in his prison guise.
Like wine spilled, yet not his life, 
A knife's kiss but minor strife.

Cage returns to the screen's delight,
In dreams gone viral takes his fight.
Cancelled fate by strangers' spite,
A nightmare pint in film is quite.

In Israel's groves of lemon, sweet,
Paths of two Nepalis meet.
One held hostage, one left dead,
Hope for friend, their ale's dread.

feedItems.title: Derek Chauvin, Killer of George Floyd, Is Expected to Survive Prison Assault
feedItems.description: The former Minneapolis police officer was attacked with a knife, but his injuries weren’t life-threatening.

feedItems.title: In Nicolas Cage's New Movie, Going Viral Is the Stuff of Nightmares
feedItems.description: “Dream Scenario” asks a scary question for our times: What does it feel like to get canceled by strangers?

feedItems.title: Hamas Attack Survivor Holds Hope for Friend Taken Hostage in Israel
feedItems.description: Nepali nationals Bipin Joshi and Himanchal Kattel arrived in Israel just three weeks before the Oct. 7 attack to tend orange and lemon groves. They found themselves in a war zone after one was taken hostage by Hamas militants and the other was shot and left for dead.
